              throws java.sql.SQLException,
                     org.json.JSONException,

        Parameters:
        username - Name of the user
        password - User's password
        game - Name of the current game
        version - Current game's version
        gamepassword - Game's Password
        Returns:
        The users id.

        java.sql.SQLException

        public int createUser(de.tud.kom.socom.util.SocomRequest req)
               throws java.sql.SQLException,
                      org.json.JSONException,
                      de.tud.kom.socom.util.exceptions.SocomException
        Creates a new user. After this the user is logged in and bound to the current game instance.
        Parameters:
        username -
        password -
        game -
        version - Game's version
        gamepassword -
        visibility - (int, 0 = private, 1 = friends, 2 = public)
        Returns:
        uid of the new user
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        org.json.JSONException

      • createUserWithSocialNetwork

        public int createUserWithSocialNetwork(de.tud.kom.socom.util.SocomRequest req)
                                throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                       org.json.JSONException,
                                       de.tud.kom.socom.util.exceptions.SocomException
        Generates a user and returns a url to login via facebook.
        Parameters:
        game -
        version -
        gamepassword -
        visibility - (int, 0 = private, 1 = friends, 2 = public)
        network - (Facebook, VZNet, Google+) where the user wants to login with
        Returns:
        uid of the new user, his username and password, a loginUrl leading to the social network login
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        org.json.JSONException
        de.tud.kom.socom.util.exceptions.SocomException

      • setCurrentContext

        public int setCurrentContext(de.tud.kom.socom.util.SocomRequest req)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException,
                             org.json.JSONException,
                             de.tud.kom.socom.util.exceptions.SocomException
        Sets the current context for the player (contexts may be: scenes, level, mapparts, ..) If the context does not exist it will be created, furthermore a relation between two contexts will be created
        Parameters:
        context - External ID of the current context
        isNewGame - true if the game is currently restarted to prevent autogenerated relations to beginning scene (default: false)
        Returns:
        success boolean
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        org.json.JSONException
        de.tud.kom.socom.util.exceptions.SocomException
